abstract: Study in Journal of the Royal Society Interface concludes that length of eyelashes for variety of mammals plays crucial role in keeping eyes from drying out.
lead_paragraph: Researchers found that across a wide variety of mammals, eyelashes are always about one-third as long as the eye is wide, the ideal length for diverting airflow around the eye and reducing evaporation.

headline.main: Length of Lashes Keeps Eyes From Drying, Study Finds
headline.print_headline: Lashes’ Length Keeps Eyes From Drying, Study Finds

snippet: Researchers found that across a wide variety of mammals, eyelashes are always about one-third as long as the eye is wide, the ideal length for diverting airflow around the eye and reducing evaporation.
